column1: @entity1 and @entity3 are brother and sister. @entity1 is seven and @entity3 is eight. Their mother, @entity4, likes to have @entity1 and @entity3 dress up in costumes and play a game where they are answering the telephone. Usually when they play the game, @entity1 answers the telephone in a loud voice, and @entity3 answers the telephone in a quiet voice. On Tuesdays, @entity1 answers in a quiet voice, and @entity3 answers in a loud voice. On Fridays, @entity1 answers in a loud voice and @entity3 in a quiet voice. @entity1 has blonde hair. @entity3 has brown hair. @entity4 has blonde hair, and @entity1 and @entity3's father, @entity2, has brown hair. He tells them to eat lettuce every time that he sees them, so that they grow big and strong like he is. @entity4 likes to add some sugar with the lettuce so that @entity1 and @entity3 know what it is like to have sweet tastes in their life. One day, a Wednesday, @entity1 throws some lettuce into @entity3's hair. @entity4 laughs an grabs some straw from their farm and puts it in @entity1's hair. @entity1 and @entity3 live on a farm. They have a goat, named @entity5, and a duck, named @entity0. They sometimes play a game with the goat where they chase him around the farm. Other times, they play a game with @entity0 where they wave at @entity0 and laugh. They have a fun life growing up on the farm.
@placeholder is the name of the goat
